meanings.sent1: The sofa looked overstuffed with all the pillows on it.
meanings.sent2: The suitcase was so overstuffed that it wouldn't close properly.
meanings.sent3: The clown car looked even more overstuffed when they tried to fit in one more person.
meanings.sent4: Her schedule was so overstuffed with appointments that she had no time to relax.
meanings.sent5: The room felt overstuffed with furniture, making it hard to move around.

meanings.definition: Stuffed with too much filling or padding.
meanings.sent1: The burrito was overstuffed with cheese and beans.
meanings.sent2: The teddy bear was so overstuffed that it was bursting at the seams.
meanings.sent3: The pillow looked comically overstuffed, like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her bag was overstuffed with snacks for the road trip.
meanings.sent5: The sandwich was so overstuffed with meat that it was hard to take a bite.
